content: a cute and fabulous **sensory and activity cube** 1 that ll definitely stimulate the little one s senses each side of the cube has different activities that ll motivate the child s curiosity and stimulate fine motor skills etc the cube has among other things an octopus with curly tentacles that are interesting to touch a lovely flower with crackly petals a cute bear that squeaks when you press him rattle rings mirror etc have fun **pattern information** the squares are crocheted in the round all rounds begin with a chain 1 this does not count as a stitch neither does it count towards the stitch total end all rounds with a slip_stitch in the first st **materials** baby cotton colors 2 5 10 11 14 19 rainbow cotton 8/4 color 9 crochet hook size 2 5 mm go handmade cube 12 5x12 5 cm go handmade wooden rings 2 pcs 45 mm go handmade rattle ring 63 mm go handmade rattle flower go handmade mirror - circular go handmade rustle cellophane go handmade squeaker - small fiberfill 2 pairs of safety eyes 6 mm hole punch tool **yarn usage** color a 11 approx 65g 2 skeins color b 2 approx 30g 1 skein color c 19 approx 10g 1 skein color d 10 approx 3g 1 skein color e 14 approx 25g 1 skein color f 5 approx 25g 1 skein rainbow 8/4 - a short piece for the snout of the teddy **yarn quality** *baby cotton* hobbii 100% egyptian cotton/ 50 g = 170 meters **abbreviations** magic_ring magic_ring chain chain st s stitch es slip_stitch s slip_stitch es single_crochet single_crochet decrease together double_crochet double_crochet **hashtags for social media** #hobbiidesign #hobbiibabyfryd 1 https //hobbii com/babyfryd-sensory-cube utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=babyfryd-sensory-cube+hbtrack&utm_term=swr
